setting: {"valueCol":"count","categoryCol":"weather","title":{"text":"","subtext":"","x":"center"},"legend":{"show":true,"orient":"vertical","x":"right"},"colors":{"enable":true,"series":[{"name":"Fine no high winds","colorIndex":0,"color":"#dd163d"},{"name":"Raining no high winds","colorIndex":1,"color":"#e95703"},{"name":"Unknown","colorIndex":2,"color":"#e4921e"},{"name":"Other","colorIndex":3,"color":"#c0b50a"},{"name":"Raining + high winds","colorIndex":4,"color":"#85ad39"},{"name":"Fine + high winds","colorIndex":5,"color":"#6caa5d"},{"name":"Snowing no high winds","colorIndex":0,"color":"#dd163d"},{"name":"Fog or mist","colorIndex":1,"color":"#e95703"},{"name":"Snowing + high winds","colorIndex":2,"color":"#e4921e"}],"backgroundColor":{"color":"","colorIndex":0}},"radius":[43,75],"showLabel":false,"merge":{"enable":false,"threshold":1,"display":"其他"},"valueFormat":"0,0","sortBy":"none","roseType":true}
query:
select count(*) as count, weather.value as weather from accident 
join weather on accident.Weather_Conditions = weather.id
where weather.id > 0
group by weather
order by count desc
name: accident_by_weather
